title: Shopping Bag, "Bloomingdale's: Swimming Pool"
medium: White kraft paper with twisted paper handles
creditline: Gift of Willa and Joseph Rosenberg
description: Continuous design of wall of swimming pool with depth of water marked from "4 1/2 FT" to "15 FT".  Blue background as water with  yellow snorkel, red inner tube, other swin accessories.  Yellow border on upper edge of bag.

tombstone.epitaph: Shopping Bag, "Bloomingdale's: Swimming Pool". White kraft paper with twisted paper handles. Gift of Willa and Joseph Rosenberg. 1999-34-6.
